title: "Exoplanet Iceberg"
content:
# Exoplanet Iceberg

Welcome to Exoplanet Iceberg, a website dedicated to exploring the wonders of the universe. Our site features stunning imagery of distant planets and galaxies, including the breathtaking photograph of a glacier on an exoplanet that serves as our main wallpaper.

Through our articles and resources, we aim to educate and inspire visitors about the mysteries of space and the latest discoveries in astronomy. Whether you're a seasoned astronomer or just starting your journey into the cosmos, there's something for everyone here at Exoplanet Iceberg.

Join us as we embark on a journey through the stars and uncover the secrets of the universe.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A photograph of a glacier on a distant planet, with the blue and white colors contrasting against the dark sky."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
